summary: Count the number of bases in a set of reads
description:
Input

One or more BAM files.

Output

Number of bases seen. If an output file name is provided, then the result will be written to that file. Otherwise it will be sent to standard console output.

Usage example

 java -jar GenomeAnalysisTK.jar \
   -R reference.fasta \
   -T CountBases \
   -I input.bam \
   [-L input.intervals]
name: CountBases
